# Indl√¶ser data
```{r}



data <- get(load("armdata.Rdata"))[5][[1]]
pers1 <- data[[1]][[2]]
person <- 10
rep <- 10
x <- c()
y <- c()
z <- c()
for (p in 1:person){
  for (r in 1:rep){
    
    longitude <- data[[p]][[r]][,1]
    x <- cbind(x,longitude)
  }
}
for (p in 1:person){
  for (r in 1:rep){
    
    transversal <- data[[p]][[r]][,2]
    y <- cbind(y,transversal)
  }
}
for (p in 1:person){
  for (r in 1:rep){
    
    vertical <- data[[p]][[r]][,3]
    z <- cbind(z,vertical)
  }
}

```
